title: Patient-reported vision impairment in low luminance relates to visual function in age ... - Nature

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: VILL scores correlated significantly with BCVA [logMAR], LLVA [logMAR], MA [logMAR] and PR-CS [logCS].
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate a validation workflow for ePRO data collection across multi-center MACUSTAR sites.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA guidance prioritizing PROs in drug development, with penalties for non-compliance.
**CONCERN**: Limited microperimetry metrics availability from both eyes may bias correlation analysis.
